Entries.default: "What'dya do that for, ya big brute? We only needed the one barrel! One!"
"Maybe if'n ye'd told me that before, we'd have a mine to go 'n loot."
"You're the ass with the giant cannon, you should know how explosives work!"
"Friends, we have more than enough gunpowder to solve this problem."
"Oh, now ya know what to do with the black powder, sure."
"Leave him be and grab a shovel, Eccea."
"Take the shovel y'self. I'll keep the watch - wasn't built for manual labor."
"Don't you dare doze off like last time."
